mapper.select: SELECT a.id AS id,a.name AS name,a.numPkm AS pkmNum,b.numBall AS ballNum FROM (select user.id,user.name,COUNT(pkm_pack.user_id) AS numPkm from user LEFT JOIN pkm_pack ON pkm_pack.user_id=user.id GROUP BY user.id,user.name) AS a, (select user.id,user.name,sum(ball_pack.num) AS numBall from user LEFT JOIN ball_pack ON ball_pack.user_id=user.id GROUP BY user.id,user.name) AS b WHERE a.id=b.id AND a.name LIKE #{keyword}
